评论详情: I have bought many of these in different colors. They wear well and wash well too. The fit is true to size.

评论概述: Perfect fit and true to size
评论详情: I purchased several of these yoga shirts for pickle ball.  I love the fit.  If you have a little tummy that you do not want a shirt to cling to, this is the top for you.  I have a few colors and they are my “go to”.  The fabric is breathable has a little stretch to it.  Super comfy and available in tons of colors.  Great value.

评论概述: It shrinks after the first wash, and feels more like a cotton shirt
评论详情: 5’8”, 170 lbs, ordered a Large. When I first got it, it was slightly too big. It gapped at my armpits, and hung down too low. I was going to return it, but I really liked the color, and decided to keep it. I gave it four stars because it does shrink. It’s a totally different shirt once you wash it. It will shrink up quite a bit, and the feel of it changes. It feels like a cheap polyester shirt out of the bag, but after you wash and dry it, it feels and lays soft like cotton. It is a thin, slightly clingy material. I cannot see my sports bra color through the material, but I can definitely see the shape. It will show some of your curves if you have any you like to normally hide. I like how it gathers over the butt from the cross over in the back.

Love the feel and length of the tank, even bought multiple colors. BUT after 2 washes, the seam is coming undone on one tank's underarm. I will agree with other reviews that the material wrinkles and I hate to put it in the dryer (due to the possibility of it unraveling). Pretty frustrating

I have ordered in the past other MIPPO brand tops had to have sized up. With this one I sized up because of last experience and I wish I would’ve kept my usual M size. This runs true to size which is too big from me. Kept it anyways as it did shrink a little in drier. Ordered another one in different color in my usual size M and it was perfect. Material is excellent quality, washed well, not see through and very cute!

I love this tank! I am 5’8” and 130lbs. Size medium fits me perfectly. The fabric is thin and light: great for outdoor pickleball. It’s long enough in the front and back—exactly like the photos. The way it drapes in back is especially nice: it fits around the hips, but is not too clingy in the middle. I love the color selection, so I am ordering two more!  I washed it on the delicate cycle in cold water. It came out very wrinkled, but I hung it on a hanger to dry, and the wrinkles came out. It didn’t shrink, either.

I am 6’1 w a long torso. Super hard to find long tops.  This shirt is plenty long. I sized up worries it wouldn’t be long enough and it’s a bit big  (totally my choice) but I don’t mind it still looks great with shirts or leggings. Will be buying more colors.
Love this shirt, But it does run Long.... Kinda annoying Or else id put 5 stars, it goes past my butt, looks like a short dress.

Very comfortable and breathable, but it is an act of god to keep it from wrinkling- I wear it regardless but it looks like I crumpled it up and threw it in a ziploc bag for a week everytime I wash it.
Runs big but nice looking

For the price the tank is fine.  Color is a true red which was nice.  The cut is generous and the tail of the tank is long and I’m long waisted.  Won’t repurchase, you get what you pay for this product and that’s a cheap tank.
If you’re looking for a loner tank top, then this is great.  It’s a little longer than my liking- but the way it fits and the fabric make up for it.  Overall it’s a nice tank.

评论概述: Comfortable but not for intense workouts
评论详情: I played a session of pickleball in this shirt the other day. Granted I play above a recreational level and in the Florida heat so take that into consideration. But this short absorbs and holds onto your sweat. The fabric itself is soft but it starts weighing down. I was just drenched and for the 1st time, needed to change my shirt before leaving the courts. I will probably give it a try once the Florida Summer is on its way out but it was embarrassing how much it showed the slightest bit of sweat and didn’t dry well at all. In fact when I washed it the dryer was not able to dry just this one shirt.

I’m on the fence about this top. I ordered it because the reviews said it was long and at 6’, there aren’t a lot of affordable options. The care tag suggested hand wash but I did run it through the wash with similar items and hung dry and it seems to be in good condition. The top is very thin which is good and cool but it’s definitely not a forgiving material if you have anything squeezing out the top of your shorts/pants. It’s also very wrinkly. Which isn’t a huge deal for early gym trips but I also don’t want to look like I just rolled out of bed.

I bought 2 colors of this tank and washed them before wearing. On one (green), the seam came undone in a section on the side after washing but before wearing.  The fabric is soft and I like the overall shape.  However, it is also very wrinkle prone.
Perfect fit, color is just as described, thin and light weight making it great for exercising in.
Love the material (so soft) and love the colors (purple and gray green), but too long for my liking. Definitely covers my butt. I am returning, but if you don't mind it being long,  great buy.
VERY NICE TANK FOR THE GYM OR ELSEWHERE

评论概述: Super soft, but clingy and wrinkly
评论详情: I love how soft these tops are and they’re nice a long as well.  The only drawbacks are that they are very clingy and wrinkly.  I still love them for yoga, but wouldn’t wear them as a tank top with shorts like some other workout shirts.

I ordered the white but it is way too see through for me. I will definitely return the shirt, but I may order one in a darker color. I wanted something that would go over my hips. I'm 5'8", usually wear a size 6. The medium was perfect for me.

评论概述: If you are an XS, do not order this (runs very big)
评论详情: I've been looking for soft workout clothing and this tank had so many good reviews. The smallest size Amazon had was a Small and I normally wear XS, but I ordered it in Blush anyway. First off, the fabric is soft and feels great on...BUT it's HUGE. I normally wear an XS but this tank was like wearing a mini dress (no I'm not petite). It runs very big and for yoga and pilates, no one needs to be drowning in fabric. Second, as I said, I ordered the top in Blush. It's more of a light salmon pink. Not what I wanted at all. So disappointed.
This is a great yoga top for the self conscious yogi. It’s a longer length and not form fitting

This is a great quality shirt for the price. It's super soft and comfy. It does wrinkle, and pins from a run can cause holes. It just depends on what you're using them for. I used it to make a running costume for a disney run and they were perfect. I ended purchasing two more. It isn't a super high quality brand/material but it worked for me.
These tops are comfortable, seem to be of good quality, and fit well.

Overall a good top.  The fushia is definitely not fushia, but more a hot pink.  The length covers front and back private areas as well as tummy, although not a flattering fit (no shape to it).  If you buy a darker color, you'll probably have a better chance of hiding your tummy.The sizing is not optimal, as I prefer the M to be 8-10 (not 6-8= this product), because the L, here a10-12, is a bit big for me.
It lite absolutely  soft
Received my top today and i love it!!  Very flattering and goes great with leggings, jean shorts, etc.  I love the longer length it has in the back!  Will be ordering in more colors!!

Fabric was poor quality. I got a large and the chest area was loose(im breastfeeding right now and currently a D cup) and the stomach area was too snug for comfort. Overall returning because I’m unimpressed
Flattering pattern, nice and long for coverage with plenty of stretch for comfort.  A bit see through but cool and comfortable. Easy to wash and dry.  I plan to purchase several more.
My favorite tank yet!!! Cute for working out or with Jean shorts. I’m coming back for more colors!

These are cute, good quality workout tops. They fit long enough on me to cover the butt...now I can work out in my biker shorts even when I'm wearing granny panties haha. I am 5'1" so they might not run as long on taller people. I got size small. I took off one star because the color description is not accurate. I ordered Blush Pink and it was more like a bright orangey kind of pink. I returned it. I also ordered the Gray Green, expecting a sage shade of green but it is light teal like robins' egg blue (nothing gray about it). Still very pretty. I'm going to order black and the army green next.
Fabric too thin, it clings to body when damp.

评论概述: Runs too long and material is thin
评论详情: I usually like my tops long, and at 5-10, those are hard to find. This one was too long and not flattering on my frame. The material seemed thin to me as well.

评论概述: I wear mippo a lot.  Always medium.  This was enormous!
评论详情: Way too big.  Not like their usual sizing
It's a great shirt. The sizes run big. I ordered an XXL but I could've easily fit into the XL. Fabric is breathable but not super thin as to be see through.

I am a size 16 (working on getting fit) and I got the XXL.  Because of a radical mastectomy I have a weird shape now.  And I clean houses for a living.  I really love this shirt and just ordered a couple more.  It’s long enough in the back to cover my behind and roomy enough that it’s not clinging to me.  In fact, I like it so much I decided to make this review!  I shop Amazon frequently for convenience and this is only the third review I have made!  A product has to be really great for me to take the time to review it!  Florida is hot and house cleaning makes me sweaty at times.  This shirt dries quickly.  Has a printed tag and no itchy seams.  A definite yes!
Soft, light and airy
Cool, performance and quality is great

评论概述: Cut is too narrow thru hips and seat.
评论详情: Liked how long it was - but cut too narrow.

Bought this tank specifically for wearing to the gym. It’s soft, comfy, and has cute colors to choose from.  After the first wear it has deodorant stains, which tells it’s not going to be durable long term and I found it to be too easily wrinkled to fit into my routine for the gym.  I’ll just have to add it to my ever growing casual tank selection since I’ve already washed and worn it. Back to the drawing board for good gym wear at reasonable prices.
I love this tank! I ran my half marathon in this!
Fits great, not clingy, and nice quality
Fabric and color are nice; however tank is too long. I am 5’7” and it come down to my upper thighs.
Great by for the money, true to size

I decided to test this some time ago. I didn't think much about it, after all, it is just a top. However, I must say that I absolutely love this. I ordered several colors already and will likely order more. It is extremely light--I live in SoCal and going hiking on the sun, this is just perfect! I love the material. The fit is perfect. I already washed them too--cold water, no softener, hang dry--and it remained exactly as it was when new.  I am going to buy more colors. I think a workout-enthusiast just cannot have enough of this... one for each day!  Edit: I bought several other colors (I now have 5) and I am absolutely loving these! And I washed several of them by now more than once and they are holding up perfectly!
I have purchased every single color I love these so much. They are longer, cover my butt which I like, and flattering.

I have several of these.  Happy with all the colors I have gotten except the one I just got.  Ordered military green & received brown.  Far from green but to much hassle to return it.  Not happy with this purchase.
Super cute and comfy, and I love the length. So hard to find anything that is not cropped these days.

评论概述: This top was longer than expected
评论详情: Personally for working out i doing it to be comfortable and to size, however it was much longer than i expected. I’m 5’8” and it came almost to the tops of my thighs
The top is comfortable.i do not dislike it

I was in the market for a relaxed fit tank. One that was still stylish but functional for working out and this is just that. Love the relaxed fit and longer length. I ordered two colors and like them so much I have been wearing them for more than just my workout. Can’t beat the price either!

评论概述: Cute, soft, form fitting around legs
评论详情: I wanted something light to wear and this is really cute. It fits my arms well, it’s not as loose around my legs as I had hoped, but it works! Maybe I just had thicker legs :) I ordered a medium and typically wear a small top, sizes 4-6 pants.

评论用户: I really really like this top. I didn’t expect it to be like a spandex top but it’s quite comfortable and the material is better than I expected. I’m tempted to buy a second.
评论详情: I really like the top it fits quite well. I didn’t expect it to body shape, but it does but it’s silky, smooth and comfortable.
The material and color were great but it runs a little long! Sad to return it.
The material shows every flaw on your body, just how it lies. Not a huge fan but it’s comfy for at home only

This workout top runs a little longer and gives a very flattering look. Also the fabric is buttery soft. I ordered my usual size and it fits great ..not tight and the fabric flows. A bought a second one in a different color.

评论概述: polyester material makes this really hot!!!
评论详情: These have a TON OF STRETCH!!! THEY ARE EXTRA LONG LIKE THE PIC - WHICH i DIDN'T LIKE, BUT OTHERS WOULD MAYBE APPRECIATE. tHE POLYESTER material prevents them from "breathing," so they are really hot to wear which is the reason for the 4 star rating.
So comfy! Very stretchy and soft! Does wrinkle a bit if it sits in the dryer too long.

I’m 6’1 and love that this tank is long enough to cover my backside. Lightweight, flowy, but still contoured fit. Breathable enough for high exertion workout. If you are on shorter side I believe this would fit more like a tunic.

评论概述: Bought for comfort and flattery after lumpectomy surgery.
评论详情: I’m 57 5’5” and around 200 lbs. usually wear XL OR XXL. I like that it’s comfy and flattering. Underarm fit is soft but not baggy. I normally like baggy/flowing fit but this one is a bit snugger which actually looks flattering and lengthens my body. Neck is perfect too not to low. I bought in black and blue snd will probably buy a couple more colors. Great for working in or camping or any summer activity👍🏻👍🏻

评论概述: It is not flattering and it wrinkles easily
评论详情: This shirt was intended for working out however I feel like its not flattering to the body and it wrinkles easily.

Cute shirt. Ordered a medium and I’m 5’6 155 lbs. fit well. Not a very long back (won’t completely cover your bum). The fabric is comfortable, super soft, light and thin- which is great. However you can see every outline, so it won’t hide a muffin top, or any ripple at all, for that matter. Back is cute design. I use it for running and it didn’t show sweat and was very comfy and cool for runs. Quick delivery overall.
Tank top was a nice fabric and fit well across the body. It was, however, as long as a dress! Very odd. Will return because of this.

评论概述: this has nice coverage from behind but hangs a bit low at the neckline
评论详情: This is a great coverup tank for working out if you dont mind showing some cleavage. it hangs low at the neckline but does offer some backside coverage

This is literally the perfect soft racer back tank. Wasn’t sure on sizing as sometimes these tops don’t run consistently. The large was just right, and the back detail is super cute! Flowy but not baggy, and the length is good. Already purchased a second color and the size was exactly the same fit as the first. For reference I am a 36dd and ordered a large. This will be a go-to summer top!!!

Definitely worth the purchase.  The only reason why I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because for me it runs big.  I followed the size chart and I should have kept to my normal size of L instead of XL.  Other than that the material is fantastic the style is cute and flattering and I will purchase again just in my normal size

I ordered this tank in black and pink, both large. As you can see from the picture, they are very different in reality. The black fits like an XL and the pink fits like a medium, neither of which are ideal. I love the material and the cut but I’m nervous about ordering another because who knows what size I’ll get?

This is a flattering top but was a little larger than I expected. Next time I would order one size down. Probably best for situations where you don’t expect to sweat a lot. Wore to hot yoga and will never do that again. The fabric doesn’t breathe well and clings to you. Would be fine for an activity that’s sweat-free.

I love, love, love this tank!  It is so soft and comfy. The fabric is breathable on a hot day at the ballpark. It is long enough that I don’t worry about showing off my FUPA when I raise my arms to cheer, and the color is red, red, which is exactly what I wanted. I’ve already bought two other colors and will be getting more.

评论概述: Nice shirts, but the material sticks to you
评论详情: So this will probably sound contradictory but I like the shirt, the style, the length and the softness.  All great. But the shirt is like static to the Gym People leggings.  I feel I am constantly unsticking it from me. But I like the shirts, purchased multiple colors. :)

I love this top -- so much so that I have purchased it in two additional colors!  It is comfortable and breathable.  I am almost six feet tall, and am thrilled that it is long enough to cover my butt and belly when I am working out.  I get compliments every time I wear any of these tops to Jazzercise class.

5'2" 125 lbs.  This is a beautiful top.  Made well, covers bum.  The arm holes aren't so long that side of breast hang out.  The neck cut is flattering.  Unfortunately I didn't notice PINCH PLEAT on back when ordering,  which makes the shirt hang more like a maternity top of my shape.  The color was true, the fabric gorgeous, the seller was awesome,  I returned because the cut was unflattering for my body.

I love how soft this top is. If anything, I'll wear it around the house and to sleep in. I'm going to try it for working out but it shows everything due to clingy fabric. Its a bit longer and bigger than expected, so maybe consider sizing down. Overall, I do like this top & color is as pictured.

I love the material.  Great weight and the tunic length was exactly as shown (5’6, 178, 36dd).  I ordered two (pink and blue) Both are Medium (usual size). The fit in front hangs a bit low under the arms and the pleat in the back doesn’t hang right.  It blouses out too much right about the bottom of the bra line.  I think in my case the small might possibly be a better fit overall OR, too tight in the tummy area.  This  contradicts the “runs small”  reviews  out here..  I’m not sure yet if I will exchange or just return.

评论概述: Not as good as I had hoped
评论详情: I like it but I don’t love it. The length shrunk quite a bit even washing on cold and hang drying.. I’m 5’7” with a longer torso and it’s about an inch or so shorter than I’d prefer but still long enough. Also, it stained really easily! My baby spit up just a little bit around the neckline of it and I immediately washed it and you can still see what almost looks like a grease stain where she spit up :(. Even after using stain removers. Kinda disappointing. I’ll still wear for bedtime but because of the staining. It is comfortable..

My tops fit perfectly. I chose xl as I typically wear L but like things a bit loses for working out. They are long enough so they don't cut me off at the largest part of my body so they are flattering They are priced right for the budget-conscious. The only thing is that the tops wrinkle-I would never take the time to iron a workout top. So if a few wrinkles bother you, keep that in mind. No rashes or rubbing problems-
Great color true to size good, packaging, quick shipping

I got this top with the plan to wear it when I run. From the description I was not sure how the material would be. It is some kind of synthetic not at all appropriate for when you are sweating out running in warm weather. It is also very long, like tunic length. I wanted something longish, but not this long. I decided to keep it to sleep in because it is very soft. Just disappointed that I cannot use it for the purpose I purchased it for.

This is a great tank. It fit great dry HOWEVER I will be ordering down a size. Once I sweat in this, it really stretched out, making the tank a sloppy fit.  I usually wear a medium but will try a small

I bought this workout top and loved it so much, i ordered two more so that I would have them to wear several times a week.  I bought an XL even though I am a M/L because I like a looser fit when doing Cross Fit/HIIT.  I would have been comfortable in an L but the XL is fine.  Good quality and versatile whether worn with leggings, running shorts or workout shorts.
I loved the material and the fit through the body was perfect. Unfortunately, the length was too long.  I’m 5’8”, 140 lbs, long torso’d, and the top went two+ inches below my bottom.
Nice loose fit, red is hard to find in active wear. Fabric is a good weight for coverage
This is the most comfortable perfect length top to wear at the gym well worth the money

Let me start with what I like about this top and it’s the only thing I like is the length of the shirt. What I don’t like and is the reason why I am returning the shirt, it is see-through. I don’t know if it’s the material or if it’s the color which I chose light gray but you can definitely see the female anatomy through the shirt even with a bra on, so I am very disappointed in this product for that reason.
I LOVE this tank top but the white is too see through. I have a purple though that I love.

评论概述: Do you like to iron your workout clothes??!!
评论详情: Bought this based on the high reviews and comments.  Perhaps my expectations were too high.  It IS a soft material and the styling is nice…….but first of all the cut was all wonky.  Long on one side and shorter on the other side by several inches.  I quickly tried it on when it arrived (didn’t notice the wonky cut), fit was fine, and threw it in the wash.  I took it out of the dryer before completely dry and oh my the wrinkles and I don’t mean a couple!  Put it back in thinking maybe a little longer would help…nope!  Who wants to iron their workout clothes!  Needless to say this is going back!  Too bad cause I had high hopes.
Too long for petite, 5'2" but will continue to use.

As soon as I removed the top from packaging I was in love with it.  The fabric is wonderful!  Nice fabric which is comfortable is a priority for me.  I ordered an XL and I wear a size L.  I thought it might be too large but it fits nicely.  If you like a roomy feel, you might want to order up.  I don't know if I'd say it runs small.  Just a personal preference.

Was so excited about this top...it looks great and feels great love everything about it.  But arrive with an stain on front looks like maybe oil stain.  So disappointed! I purchased a xl because of reviews said it runs small.  Size up because it does runs small.
I ordered this shirt, it arrived on time, and fits perfect. The material is soft, and the fit is long just past the hips.

I would not use this as a workout top, at least not a heavy duty workout. It’s great though with leggings,  for going for a long walk, spending time outside, or doing errands. It is very comfortable! Washes beautifully. It is a great length to wear with leggings.

Was unable to get an XS, so I bought a S. Fits with some room; thus, I expect a S to be true to size. The red color is certainly a bright red (like firetruck red). Is comfortable and moves with you. Use for working out and works well.
Runs a little large I would go down a size

I choose size Medium based on the size chart but it was too big and way too long.  Definitely not for petites. If you are 5'2 like me it's almost a dress.  It's a cute style though and comes in good colors. I wish they had a petite version.

I love the color and material of this tank top! It's so soft :D And it fits great through my bust and shoulders. I'm a size 10 and I ordered a large. It just clings to my middle a little more than I prefer. I would definitely order again but I'll go up a size!
Loved the material and the way it fit. Light and airy!
Medium too big for 5'6" and 135 lbs. Very large under armpits. Nice color and material.
Quality is good, purple color is beautiful but as a woman who is 5'8" the top is way too long for me.  It hit below my butt.  I returned it.

Very comfortable to work out in and love the length..wish it was moisture wicking or didn’t show sweat as much..slightly bigger than I thought it would be but still fits well and I don’t have into query about my stomach falling out when I’m doing burpees!

This shirt is a great all around shirt. Very soft and comfy. Long enough to cover my backside. It is flowy and soft. I personally would like the neck line a little lower. But it perfect for my home workouts and being comfy.
